## Variables

`speaker`

:   Speaker's ID.

`word`

:   Word.

`phone`

:   Target phone (graphemic representation).

`prev`

:   Previous phone.

`post`

:   Following phone.

`voicing`

:   Consonant voicing.

`start`

:   Consonant release time (s).

`end`

:   Onset of voicing (s).

`VOT`

:   Voice Onset Time (s).
